item.description:
Hey everyone. I'm thinking of moving the next meetup to Hingham Beerworks. It's a nice new place over in the Shipyard. If the weather is good, I think they have tables outside. If not, it's still a fun place to check out. I'm open to other venue suggestions. Last year we met at East Bay Grill in the back patio/bar area, which was really nice, but perhaps to far south? Please let me know what you think.

 

Thanks & hopefully I'll see you next week!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the bar area. If you can't find the group ask the hostess or call me on my cell 847-361-8851
item.why: It's been 4 weeks since our last meet up!

group.name: South Shore Graphic Designers, Writers & Web Folks

item.name: Monthly Gathering - Hingham Beerworks
